name: Dimensional Shift (Artias)
description:
This project was made during the Interstellar Game Jam 4

Dimensional Shift is puzzle-platformer where player shifts between dimensions to retrieve the alien relics.

Controls
Movement - Left / Right Arrow Key
Jump - Space / Up Arrow Key
Phase Shift - X
Detect Dimension Terrain - C

Credits
BGM - By lowenergygirl
SFX - By JDWasabi,  Shapeforms
Fonts - Retro Gaming Font
